about.all:
## Live Stream Recordings

Browse recordings from creators who use LiveStreamRecorder to save their live streams.

### What You'll Find Here

Creators use our platform to automatically record their TikTok Lives, Twitch streams, YouTube broadcasts, and Kick streams. Browse their content, watch recordings, and discover new creators.

### Watch and Download

Every recording is available to watch instantly. Premium users can download recordings for offline viewing.

### For Creators

Want your streams here? Sign up free and start recording. Paste your channel URL, go live, and we save everything automatically. Use ClipAI to turn your streams into short clips and grow your audience.

### Supported Platforms

We support TikTok live recording, Twitch VOD saving, YouTube live recording, Kick stream recording, AfreecaTV recording, and Pandalive recording. More platforms coming soon.
about.tiktok:
## TikTok Live Recordings

Browse TikTok live recordings from creators who use LiveStreamRecorder to save their Lives.

### TikTok Lives Saved

TikTok Lives disappear when they end. Creators use our TikTok live recorder to save their broadcasts automatically. Browse their content here.

### Watch TikTok Recordings

Every TikTok live recording is available to watch instantly. Premium users can download TikTok recordings for offline viewing.

### Record Your TikTok Lives

Want your TikTok Lives here? Sign up free and add your username. We record every Live automatically. Use ClipAI to turn your Lives into short clips and grow your following.

### TikTok Live Recorder

No screen recorder needed. No phone running all night. Just add your TikTok and we capture every Live in high quality.
about.twitch:
## Twitch Stream Recordings

Browse Twitch recordings from creators who use LiveStreamRecorder to save their streams.

### Twitch VODs That Don't Expire

Twitch VODs expire after 14-60 days. Creators use our Twitch recorder to save their streams permanently. Browse their content here.

### Watch Twitch Recordings

Every Twitch recording is available to watch instantly. No ads, no interruptions. Premium users can download Twitch VODs for offline viewing.

### Record Your Twitch Streams

Want your Twitch streams here? Sign up free and add your channel. We record every broadcast automatically. Use ClipAI to turn your streams into short clips and grow your channel.

### Twitch VOD Downloader

Save Twitch streams permanently. No more expired VODs, no more deleted archives. Your content, saved forever.
about.youtube:
## YouTube Live Recordings

Browse YouTube live recordings from creators who use LiveStreamRecorder to save their broadcasts.

### YouTube Lives Saved

Not all YouTube Lives are saved by creators. Some get deleted, some go private. Creators use our YouTube live recorder to keep a permanent copy. Browse their content here.

### Watch YouTube Recordings

Every YouTube live recording is available to watch instantly. Premium users can download recordings for offline viewing.

### Record Your YouTube Lives

Want your YouTube Lives here? Sign up free and add your channel. We record every live stream automatically. Use ClipAI to turn your Lives into Shorts and grow your subscribers.

### YouTube Live Recorder

Automatic recording for every YouTube Live. No software to install, no manual saving. Just go live and we capture everything.
about.kick:
## Kick Stream Recordings

Browse Kick recordings from creators who use LiveStreamRecorder to save their streams.

### Kick VODs Saved

Kick is growing fast. Creators use our Kick recorder to save their streams and build their content library. Browse their content here.

### Watch Kick Recordings

Every Kick recording is available to watch instantly. Premium users can download Kick VODs for offline viewing.

### Record Your Kick Streams

Want your Kick streams here? Sign up free and add your channel. We record every broadcast automatically. Use ClipAI to turn your streams into short clips and grow your audience.

### Kick Stream Recorder

Automatic recording for every Kick stream. No software needed. Just go live and we save everything.
